titleStmt.title: Daniel Seixas to James W. Tate
CWG7881

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
James.W. Tate
Asst Secretary of State
Dear Sir

Sickness has prevented me from answering your communication of the 12th of December until now and if not to late I would like my commission renewed which will expire on 14th February next, Please find enclosed five Dollars required by the State of Kentucky, please acknowledge the receipt of this letter and oblige

Yours respectfully
Dan Seixas
56 Wall Street
N. Y.
New York January 27th/63

New York
Comr of Deeds
Danl Seixas
Comn Issd Feby 4th 1863
